name: VAD - Virtually Assured Destruction
description: V.A.D - A multi genre VR game for Oculus Rift - Battle through a myriad of challenges. Explore space stations, command a space shuttle, defeat giant enemy bosses, survive trap rooms and discover devices to defeat your enemies. As well as a bunch of mini games, puzzles and achievements.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-6400 2.7GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 - GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
